r.s: A simple wrapper class for the Nmap utility
r.d:
Net_Nmap is a simple interface for Nmap, the free and open source utility for network exploration or security auditing.
Net_Nmap can be used to auto discovery hosts and services in your network or simply to parse Nmap XML output.
Note: Requires a Nmap installation on your system. Nmap is available from http://nmap.org/
r.n: - Misc improvements to clean up the package, and make it easier to run tests (CloCkWeRX) - Added support for Nmap Statistics and other improvements (Thanks to BARRY Ibrahima)
